Package net.tangly.core

Interface HasTimeInterval

All Known Subinterfaces:
Entity, NamedEntity, QualifiedEntity
All Known Implementing Classes:
EntityImp, LegalEntity, NamedEntityImp, NaturalEntity, QualifiedEntityImp
public interface HasTimeInterval
Defines a mixin with an absolute time interval.
